Title: The Devil You Know
Genre: Action, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Dylan Gallagher, Tonya Kong (story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Joanne Whalley
Plot: Driven to the edge, Dex loses his way until he's offered a lifeline by Fisk. Matt comes to Karen for help, which she agrees to give -- on one condition.
